item.title: Rubio meets Netanyahu to discuss fallout from Israel's Qatar strike
item.description: Israel's strike targeting Hamas leaders in Doha last week drew international outrage and was publicly criticised by the US.

item.title: India court stays key provisions of controversial new law on Muslim properties
item.description: The court refused to strike down the entire law saying "the grant of stay is only in the rarest of rare category".

item.title: Kirk suspect 'not co-operating' with authorities, governor says
item.description: He adds that "much more evidence and information" will become available once charges are filed in the case.

item.title: Brazil's Lula hits back at Trump over Bolsonaro trial and tariffs
item.description: In an essay, he says Brazil's democracy and sovereignty "are not on the table" after clashes with the White House.

item.title: Cash for speeches and big wins for The Pitt and The Studio - Emmys highlights
item.description: Host Nate Bargatze's plan to keep speeches snappy backfires and political statements take centre stage at the 77th Primetime Emmy Awards.
